content: {"name": "Mount Zion Christian Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Call between 7:30am to 10:30am  for the appointment, and from 12:30 to 1:30 pm is the distribution hours ", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3519 Fayetteville Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Durham", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "27707", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.9571891, "longitude": -78.90899}, "phones": [{"number": "(919) 683-2599", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}]}
